snippet: After a six-month study, Val Ackerman, a former president of USA Basketball and the W.N.B.A., recommended significant changes to rules and to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
abstract: Val Ackerman, former president of USA Basketball and WNBA, conducts intensive six-month study on the state of women's college basketball; finds great need to broaden the appeal of women's college basketball beyond older fans and families to more students and casual fans, to enhance officiating and improve governance, to increase scoring and to boost revenue in the sport; recommends significant changes to rules and to the NCAA tournament.
lead_paragraph: After a six-month study, Val Ackerman, a former president of USA Basketball and the W.N.B.A., recommended significant changes to rules and to the N.C.A.A. tournament.

headline.main: A Push to Invigorate Women’s Basketball
headline.print_headline: What to Do About Women’s Basketball
